pages.text: $(li)Cactus are plants that will hurt any creature who dates to approach them.$(br)$(li)You can use Cactus to craft Cactus Batch, and a Cactus Armor in a Crafting Table$(br)$(li)You can obtain Cactus Paste Smelting a Cactus in a Furnace.

$(li)You can find Cactus in dry areas, like Deserts.$(br)$(li)You can plant this block in a block of Sand.$(br)$(li)It grows even if the newly-grown block would immediately break due to adjacent blocks.
